title: Setting up an Appointment
text: My appointments typically last under 30 minutes, but if necessary, they can be extended to address further issues. Please note that while I am here to help, I cannot serve as your personal tutor. I encourage you to attend our assigned office hours, ask questions, and work with your classmates to resolve any difficulties you may be experiencing. If you still require assistance or are unable to resolve your concerns, please do not hesitate to schedule an appointment with me

title: Setting up an Appointment
text:
Appropriate Email
Hello NAME,
Briefly explain what you are struggling with and/or insert screenshots of error messages (If its code related)
My available times this week are

Monday: ANYTIME
Tuesday: 10am-12pm, 2-3pm
Wednesday: 10am-1pm
Thursday: ANYTIME
Friday, 8am-2pm

Do any of these times work for you?
your signature

title: Setting up an Appointment
text:
Not Appropriate Email
Hello NAME,
Can we setup an appointment? Im struggling with the assignment

In the appropriate email example, you have inserted images of your errors and sometimes issues can be resolved through email without even having to meet. If the issue can not be easily resolved through email I now have your schedule and can easily setup an appointment to meet.
In the not appropriate email email example, I reply yes then give you my available times, afterwards you reply you can’t meet during those times so you send me your available times, and then I proceed to agree with those times etc… This long and tedious process can be avoided from the start if you just follow the first example :)

title: Jose Toledo Luna
text:
I am currently a fifth year Statistics Ph.D. student at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) working with Hongquan Xu. Prior to joining UCLA, I obtained my BA and MS degrees in Statistics from California State University, Fullerton. You can learn more about me from my CV
I am gratefully funded by the Eugene V. Cota-Robles Fellowship
